GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.11.16
GSD.description:
dmaengine: idxd: clear MSIX permission entry on shutdown

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.11.16 by commit c84b8982d7aa9b4717dc36a1c6cbc93ee153b500, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 8e50d392652f20616a136165dff516b86baf5e49. For more details please see the references link.
